title: Team placements
body:
Hey,
Just played 5 games as a team, we won two from 5 (lost 1, won 2, lost 2) and ended up in B5.
Needless to say, not quite the result we were expecting. We expected to get bronze, but not quite that low, especially when one of the last games we had lost was against plat and gold players.
Just curious if someone could explain how team placements actually work to me, and how winning didnt seem to affect anything
Cheers
Zyv

replies.body: The other thing is that you can keep disbanding and remaking the team if you so please

Understand the ranks work abit differently in ranked 5's and you'll find it easier to climb is you win more..


don't look at the rank, its not whats important mate.

what is important is that you have a team of 5 people who enjoy playing together and will grow as a team.


Have fun mate
